Class PredictionManager

java.lang.Object
core.FeatureManager
prediction.PredictionManager
public class PredictionManager extends FeatureManager
The PredictionManager class manages the stock price prediction logic.

This class acts as a coordinator and interface for various prediction algorithms implemented in the Prediction class. It provides methods to generate predictions such as Simple Moving Average (SMA), regression line, Holt's linear smoothing, and hybrid future price predictions.

PredictionManager also includes utility methods to retrieve parameters (e.g., SMA periods and smoothing factors) tailored for different stock data ranges (such as 1 week, 1 month, 3 months, etc.).

It extends FeatureManager and is designed to integrate with other application components, such as sentiment analysis and simulation, to support enhanced and contextual prediction workflows.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    PredictionManager()
    Constructs a new PredictionManager, initializing the internal Prediction instance used for calculating stock price predictions.

  • Constructor Details

    • PredictionManager

      public PredictionManager()
      Constructs a new PredictionManager, initializing the internal Prediction instance used for calculating stock price predictions.

  • Method Details

    • sma

      public StockData sma(StockData data, int range)
      Calculates the Simple Moving Average (SMA) prediction for the given stock data over the specified period.
      Parameters:
      data - the stock data to base the SMA prediction on
      range - the number of data points (period) to include in the SMA
      Returns:
      a StockData object containing SMA prediction results, or null if input data is null

    • regressionLine

      public StockData regressionLine(StockData data)
      Calculates the linear regression line prediction for the given stock data.
      Parameters:
      data - the stock data to base the regression line prediction on
      Returns:
      a StockData object containing regression line prediction results, or null if input data is null

    • smoothing

      public StockData smoothing(StockData data, double alpha, double beta)
      Applies Holt's linear exponential smoothing to the given stock data using the specified alpha (level smoothing) and beta (trend smoothing) parameters.
      Parameters:
      data - the stock data to smooth
      alpha - the smoothing factor for the level component (0 < alpha < 1)
      beta - the smoothing factor for the trend component (0 < beta < 1)
      Returns:
      a StockData object containing the smoothed stock prices, or null if input data is null

    • predictFutureHybrid

      public StockData predictFutureHybrid(StockData data, double sentimentScore)
      Generates a hybrid future price prediction by combining multiple prediction methods with sentiment score adjustment.
      Parameters:
      data - the historical stock data
      sentimentScore - the sentiment score used to adjust prediction (expected range: -1 to 1)
      Returns:
      a StockData object containing the hybrid future price predictions, or null if input data is null

    • getSMAPeriodForRange

      public int getSMAPeriodForRange(String range)
      Retrieves the recommended SMA period for a given stock data range.
      Parameters:
      range - the string representation of the stock data range (e.g., "1W", "1M", "3M", "6M", "1Y", "5Y", "MAX")
      Returns:
      the SMA period (number of data points) appropriate for the range

    • getAlphaBetaForRange

      public double[] getAlphaBetaForRange(String range)
      Retrieves the smoothing factors alpha and beta for Holt's linear smoothing based on the stock data range.
      Parameters:
      range - the string representation of the stock data range (e.g., "1W", "1M", "3M", "6M", "1Y", "5Y", "MAX")
      Returns:
      a double array where index 0 is alpha and index 1 is beta smoothing factors
